name: Float16.SIMD64Storage
desc: Storage for a vector of 64 floating-point values.

items.name: typealias Float16.SIMD64Storage.Scalar
items.desc: The type of scalars in the vector space.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Creates a vector with zero in all lanes.

items.name: var scalarCount: Int
items.desc: The number of scalars, or elements, in the vector.

items.name: static var scalarCount: Int
items.desc: The number of scalars, or elements, in a vector of this type.

items.name: subscript(Int) -> Float16
items.desc: Accesses the element at the specified index.
